wysiwyg_a.p: The DS_SELECT function block type allows the selection of dedicated subsets of a given data table due to numbered input events.
It is a generic function block.
(More information about generic blocks: Studio help (press F1) at Solution→Distributed PAC Project→Editors→System Editor)

wysiwyg.p: The DS_SELECT function block type is a generic FBT and therefore takes an arbitrary number CNTX of subsets as input. Every subset consists of CNTY variables of arbitrary data type. By receiving one of the CNTX input events REQ the function block selects the according subset with the same index and copies its values to the output variables forming the output subset.
Furthermore the output events IND and CNF with the same index as REQ are raised.
